author: benharvey.eth
content:
Hey guys, hope all is well!

I'm trying to model the TAM for data availability services in 2023. It's a rough model, but my process thus far is:
- Linear regression on Ethereum gas fee revenue to predict 2023 annual revenue
- Assume 80% of transactions occur on rollups, and that all rollups utilise DA services (is this reasonable?)
- The bit I'm struggling with is estimating what % of of this 80% of gas will be spent on DA services, any suggestions on how I could make this an educated estimate?? 

Ty!

author: plasmapower
content: Are you including EIP-4844 blobs as a data availability service?

author: benharvey.eth
content: I wasn't planning on it - do you think I should?? And if so, why?
